work.summary: Web developer managing and maintaining Cisco large scale online Demo and Education delivery website for lab learning and virtual training. Responsible for internal management tool developing and network monitoring system provision and implementation.
highlights: Responsible for developing, automating and maintaining a dynamtic web applications for metrics reporting and automation with Python and Tableau
Responsible for platform content validation and promotion within VMware service and NetApp storage.
Designed, developed and maitainted lab scheduling and management tool with Perl.
Developed internal web service to automate VMware provision and configuration.
Maintained legacy systems and repos, resolving bugs and feature requests and performed testing.

work.summary: Backend Engineer developed and maintained a local search application. Responsible for capturing merchants' information, crawled data for application increase 400%+ in 3 months
highlights: Used PHP&jQuery to build a web crawler to fetch merchants information from Internet
Worked in a data analyst role and dealing with, clearing up merchants data
Developed and maintaining database of application using MySQL
Tested and validated work produced as part of the development process
Worked with a multi-disciplinary team to convert business needs into technical specifications.

work.summary: Responsible for maintaining and installing computer networks based around Linus Server Technologies. Working as part of a team and operating in a fast paced, changing and challenging 24x7 environment
highlights: Provided tier 2 technical support for 200+ Windows/Mac users for system and network related issues
Performed firewall administration and network topology configuration, improved network stability and security.
Managed and monitored virtual server environments.
Deployed and implemented file collaboration application in Linux environment.

keywords: Debian Linux and flavours including Ubuntu, Backtrack
